simpledb

Class LogicalJoinNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.LogicalJoinNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogicalSubplanJoinNode

    public class LogicalJoinNode
extends java.lang.Object
    A LogicalJoinNode represens the state needed of a join of two tables in a LogicalQueryPlan

    • Field Detail

      • t1Alias

        public java.lang.String t1Alias
        The first table to join (may be null). It's the alias of the table (if no alias, the true table name)

      • t2Alias

        public java.lang.String t2Alias
        The second table to join (may be null). It's the alias of the table, (if no alias, the true table name).

      • f1PureName

        public java.lang.String f1PureName
        The name of the field in t1 to join with. It's the pure name of a field, rather that alias.field.

      • f1QuantifiedName

        public java.lang.String f1QuantifiedName

      • f2PureName

        public java.lang.String f2PureName
        The name of the field in t2 to join with. It's the pure name of a field.

      • f2QuantifiedName

        public java.lang.String f2QuantifiedName

      • p

        public Predicate.Op p
        The join predicate
